pageContext.claim: “'I like the fact that the President is making the case (Border Security & Crime) to the American people. Now we know where Nancy Pelosi, Chuck Schumer & the Democrats stand, which is no Border Security. Will be big 2020 issue.' Matt Schlapp, Chair, ACU.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump, in quoting a supporter, left out the middle of his statement -- that "I know people don't like shutdowns" and expressing sympathy for the fact that federal workers had to go through a period of "financial uncertainty."
